nodes.text: The Tanta Aurek system was a star system in the Grumani sector of the Outer Rim Territories, on the Hydian Way. Its name originated from the phenomenon that its sun, Tanta Aurek, and the star of the Tanta Besh system, Tanta Besh, appeared as a double star in the sky of the planet Obica. The system contained the planet Scelepas.
